thread.section_title: The 2 Week Diet Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of The 2 Week Diet | www.2weekdiet.com
thread.title: Kayla Fratianno
thread.title_full: The 2 Week Diet reviewed by Kayla Fratianno

author: Kayla Fratianno
title: Kayla Fratianno
text:
The basic scientific information about weight loss, nutrition and exercise pack into this little book is amazing. No fluff here. Just a lot powerful information that anyone can use and implement immediately!
The diet is very simple, and even the Daily Energy drink that was promoted makes sense. A person can still eat all the fruits and vegetables they want or not, the energy drink takes care of any lacking in the diet as if you actually had 12 servings that day.
I am going to try out this diet and highly recommend for anyone to try it as well. Looks like the return on investment of proper dieting is not only easy but will pay off quickly and for the rest of my life!
